objects.text: • MULTIPLE CYCLES • ENERGY EFFICIENT • SMART SENSING

product_details.name: Insignia™ High-Efficiency Digital Front Load Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicates, and Quick Dry
• Large capacity drum with spacious interior for family-sized loads
• LED digital display shows remaining time and cycle status
• Easy-to-use control dial with multiple temperature settings
• Energy-efficient operation to help reduce utility costs
• Convenient maintenance access panel for easy cleaning and service
• Ventilation system with proper airflow management
• Durable construction with premium finish
• Compact yet powerful design perfect for apartments and homes
• Clear viewing window to monitor drying progress
• Advanced moisture sensing technology for optimal drying results

banner_details:
A bold and modern promotional banner designed for a home appliance, specifically a laundry dryer. The composition centers around a high-resolution product image placed within a white circular cutout surrounded by decorative dashed strokes, giving it a dynamic, futuristic energy. The background features a cool radial gradient enhanced with geometric elements like outlined circles and angled lines, adding depth and visual motion.

Text layers include a dominant heading ("heading") at the top, a subheading tagline ("tagline") emphasizing key selling points, and a list of features ("description") near the bottom. The price text ("price") is boldly displayed inside a stylized gradient circle on the right. A yellow call-to-action button ("cta" and "cta_background") anchors the design at the bottom center for immediacy and contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: #5EAEE3  
- Deep Blue: #1A6BA0  
- Gradient Circle Start: #42C0FB  
- Gradient Circle End: #0D8FCE  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Highlight Text Blue: #E0F7FF  
- CTA Button Yellow: #FFD700  
- CTA Text Navy: #0D3B56
product_color: This product image features a sleek, modern design with a clean and minimalistic color palette. The primary color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF) that gives a sense of cleanliness and efficiency. The large circular door features glossy black (#000000) to add visual contrast and emphasis. The digital screen uses neon blue (#00C9FF) and white for clarity and high-tech appeal, while the control knob includes silver (#C0C0C0) and subtle highlights of red (#FF4C4C) and blue (#007BFF), creating a balanced yet vibrant look. The colors are blended seamlessly through reflective surfaces and soft lighting, giving the product a polished, premium aesthetic.
